description: Multimedia artists and animators create animation and visual effects for television, movies, video games, and other forms of media.

qualifications.1: Bachelor’s degree in computer graphics, art, or a related field.
qualifications.3: Creativity; computer skills; communication skills; time-management skills.

responsibilities.1: Create two-dimensional and three-dimensional images depicting objects in motion or illustrating a process, using computer animation or modeling programs.
responsibilities.2: Create basic designs, drawings, and illustrations for product labels, cartons, direct mail, or television.
responsibilities.3: Work with a team of animators and artists to create a movie, game, or visual effect.
